DataElement.preferredDefinition: the single-character text box to indicate that the edge or border of the tissue removed in cancer surgery, is not  evaluable or amenable to systematic, objective appraisal.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the edge or border of the tissue removed in cancer surgery, not being evaluable or amenable to systematic, objective appraisal.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The edge or border of the tissue removed in cancer surgery.  The margin is described as negative or clean when the pathologist finds no cancer cells at the edge of the tissue, suggesting that all of the cancer has been removed.  The margin is described as positive or involved when the pathologist finds cancer cells at the edge of the tissue, suggesting that all of the cancer has not been removed.

Concepts.definition: One of the criteria for assessment of the effectiveness of given surgical procedure in achieving the local control of a neoplasm and the adequacy of tumor removal. It is defined by the tissue plane through which the dissection has been done and the actual or potential neoplastic tissue which has been left outside the boundary of a resected specimen within the patient. There are four types of surgical margins: intracapsular or intralesional, marginal, wide, and radical.

Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Evaluation; the act of placing value on something.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: any measurements of a patient's surgical margins.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a single character text field to record data.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
